dItem.boxText: <font size='18'>The Later Middle Ages were characterized by economic and social stability.</font>
<font size='18'>By 1500 the European economy had become more efficient.</font>
<font size='18'>The Catholic church faced increasing criticism and institutional crises.</font>
<font size='18'>By 1500, the European population exceeded what it had been in 1300.</font>
<font size='18'>Europeans worked to improve their political and religious institutions.</font>
<font size='18'>People during the Later Middle Ages tended to be optimistic about the future.</font>
